flavor.reason: The food was described as bland and inconsistent, with some dishes overcooked or undercooked.

freshness.reason: There were frequent complaints about stale or poorly prepared food, with some diners reporting health concerns.

service.reason: Service was criticized for being slow and inattentive, with long waits and unprofessional staff.

environment.reason: The restaurant was described as poorly maintained, with cleanliness issues and an unwelcoming entrance.

value.reason: Prices were considered high for the quality of food and service, with many diners feeling the experience was not worth the cost.
